DOC.brief_summary: The primary hypothesis is improved postoperative analgetic quality using S-Ketamine, particularly in patients suffering from chronic pain.
DOC.brief_title: The Preemptive Analgetic Potency of Low Dose S-Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators are dealing mainly with the finding of the right dosage for the optimal safety and efficacy of S-Ketamine, but also discovering new possible areas of investigation (e.g. anti-depressive effect, anti-neuropathic effect).
